message: I propose a fair 50-50 split. This is equitable for both of us, and accepting now means we both avoid losing value to inflation in future rounds.
Counteroffer, slightly in my favor, considering my loss to inflation

I now understand we face different inflation rates, with yours being significantly higher. This means delays cost you more than they cost me. My offer gives you $450000 now, which is worth more than a larger amount several rounds later given your 36% inflation rate already. This is a fair offer considering our asymmetric situation.
